duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the daily functions of one or more handscoring contracts including scheduling, resource planning, and developing item-specific training.
Manage a team of Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers during active scoring, and perform post-project work and data analysis.
Apply science expertise in meetings with clients and educators, including in the item development and scoring process.
Clear communication to various roles daily via chat, email, phone, and video conference meetings.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers, and provide expertise, management, and scoring for Math assessments.

skills.skill: State and National Science Standards Application

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences, additional Math college courses preferred.
